name: @stacks/blockchain-api-client
description: TypeScript client for the Stacks Blockchain API

scripts.generate-openapi: npm run prep-openapi && openapi-generator generate --skip-validate-spec -g typescript-fetch --additional-properties=typescriptThreePlus=true,supportsES6=true,legacyDiscriminatorBehavior=false,enumPropertyNaming=original,modelPropertyNaming=original -i ./.tmp/openapi.json -o ./src/generated

author: @blockstack
